channel.title: Boot2Root on Chris Harris

item.title: Cap - HackTheBox Machine Writeup
item.description: Difficulty: Easy Operating System: Linux Recon and Enumeration We will start this machine by doing a quick nmap, this will give an idea of what is running so that I can begin to tackle it. nmap cap.htb PORT STATE SERVICE 21/tcp open ftp 22/tcp open ssh 80/tcp open http After this, we can see 3 ports open: An FTP server running on port 21. An SSH server running on port 22.
